author: Karl Francis L Batungbacal
title: Johan Ghazali ONE 170 Johan Estupinan: "He is definitely a step up in competition" - Johan Ghazali excited to test himself against undefeated phenom Johan Estupinan
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } Follow Us Share 0 Discuss 0 Discuss What's your opinion? "He is definitely a step up in competition" - Johan Ghazali excited to test himself against undefeated phenom Johan Estupinan Discuss Now Johan Ghazali (left) and Johan Estupinan (right) will battle at ONE 170 [Photos via: ONE Championship] Blue-chip Muay Thai rising star Johan Ghazali always wants to fight the best athletes under the ONE Championship banner. He will get his wish at ONE 170 on Jan. 24, 2025, as he faces Johan Estupinan in a flyweight Muay Thai bout.
During the virtual media day for ONE's first numbered card of the new year, 18-year-old 'Jojo' said this about his eighth opponent in the world's largest martial arts promotion:
"He's definitely a step up in competition. But that's what I came for. I expected this in ONE Championship and I feel all my next fights will be a step up in competition. So I'm ready. He is definitely a step up in competition, but it's something I'm used to." Trending Get the latest updates on One Championship Rankings at Sportskeeda and more
The Malaysian-American has logged five knockouts in his six-win ONE tenure, though he could be in for a rough night against Estupinan inside the Impact Arena in Bangkok, Thailand.
Since debuting in May, 'Panda Kick' has quickly established himself as a must-watch fighter after posting three finishes in four victories .
With the knockout artists set to battle at ONE 170, the winner could earn a coveted top-five spot in the 135-pound Muay Thai division's rankings.

author: Atusateelpelo
title: #30 Mientras Kiev avanza en Kursk, Rusia contraataca en Donetsk [ENG]
text:
[JohnnyQuest](/user/JohnnyQuest)a [politico.eu](/go/link/3969478) [#1](c1#c-1) En una semana.
Casi tanto conquistado por Ucrania como lo conquistado por Rusia desde 1 de Enero.
[#1](c1#c-1) En la televisión Rusa ya algunos dicen que ceder territorio a Ucrania. Lo nunca visto.
[Propagandistas instan a los rusos a prepararse para el peor de los casos [ruso, subs, en inglés]]https://www.meneame.net/story/propagandistas-instan-rusos-prepararse-peor-casos-ruso-subs
Si, estamos viendo a diario los asaltos suicidas rusos en la region de Donetsk...... al ritmo de "avances" que llevan, van a tardar unas 2 décadas en tomar lo que les queda de Donbas
[#9](c9#c-9) A mi me recuerda mas cuando estas en juego y lo tienes todo perdido y usas aquellas tropas que tenias perdidas en una esquina al ataque a ver si suena la flauta...pero terminas perdiendo todo igual.
[#28](c28#c-28) Tan fuerte que en vez de recuperar su territorio pateando culos rusos...
...se ha ido a conquistar territorios rusos sin apenas defensas que, segun comentan los expertos, seran muy dificiles de conservar al tratarse de llanuras sin defensas (esto ultimo lo he leido por ahi, no tengo ni idea).
Al parecer Rusia avanza en el Donetsk al doble de velocidad que hace unos días. El Kurtsk puede ser una mala auto- trampa para el ejército ucraniano, ya se verá.
Es poco creíble que haya habido avances de interés en el Donbas cuando han retirado los refuerzos que hacen falta en Kursk. Ucrania también las retiró, al planificar el ataque, pero no se enteró nadie y habra sido hace semanas.
De momento parece que en Kursk los ucranianos siguen avanzando y consolidando sin resistencia seria. Estamos todos esperando que encuentren posiciones defensivas y se parapeten pero ellos siguen y siguen. Veremos dónde ponen la línea defensiva, porque esto ha pasado de sorprendente.
[#17](c17#c-17) yo estoy seguro de que si Rusia se propone echarlos los va a echar, no rápidamente, no sin coste, pero lo pueden hacer. Lo que no entiendo es por qué dices que no lo van a poder retener si no se les obliga a ello con los medios adecuados, cosa que dista bastante de ser la situación actual. La mayoría de analistas esperaban que los ucranianos se estanquen a los tres días, y al décimo siguen a avanzando. Y cuanto más tarde Rusia en frenarlos primero, y en echarlos después, más fuertes serán sus posiciones y van a requerir más medios y más destrucción de su propio país para lograrlo.

author: The Frontier Post
title: Rauf should be in Pakistan Test side, says ex-captain Afridi
text:
KARACHI (Reuters): Former Pakistan captain Shahid Afridi said fast bowler Haris Rauf should be playing in the three-Test series against Australia, where conditions would suit him, instead of the Big Bash League (BBL).
White-ball specialist Rauf, who has played only one Test and nine first-class matches in his career, turned down an offer to be part of Pakistan’s tour of Australia and opted instead to compete for the BBL’s Melbourne Stars.
Players stand to earn more from franchise cricket than international cricket, with Australia’s Big Bash League a particularly enticing prospect for Pakistan’s cricketers, who are banned from the lucrative Indian Premier League (IPL).
After a brief standoff with Pakistan’s cricket board (PCB), Rauf was given permission earlier this month to make a limited appearance in the BBL, in which the 30-year-old has played four matches and taken six wickets.
“I think Haris should be part of this side instead, rather than (the BBL),” Afridi, who led the country in Test cricket, one day internationals and T20 between 2009 and 2016, told reporters on the sidelines of the second Test in Melbourne on Friday.
“In these conditions, the kind of pace he has, he would have performed well and enjoyed himself on the kinds of pitches Australia prepared in Perth and here.”
The third and final Test of the series will be played at the Sydney Cricket Ground from Jan. 3.

author: Egypt Independent
title: Al-Azhar takes on atheism with new social media initiative
text:
The Al-Azhar World Center for Electronic Fatwa has launched an independent page on Facebook called “ Bayan ” to counter atheism and secular thought.
The page aims to provide safe avenue for dialogue with young minds, protect them from religious misinterpretation, and help them navigate faith in the current digital age.
A number of members of the center and professors from Al-Azhar University and Egyptian universities specializing in creed and philosophy, Islamic jurisprudence, psychology, sociology, mental health, and other different specializations will work on the content provided on the social media platform.
It aims to serve as a credible resource for those seeking accurate information about Islam and its laws, proactively addressing issues raised on social media and in the media.
Furthermore, the page will be a hub for specialized awareness programs, all presented in a clear and engaging way. It will deliver essential information through electronic and media campaigns designed to be easily understood by young audiences.

organizations.name: al-azhar world center for electronic fatwa

author: NewsBreak Original
title: STORM WATCH: Coastal storm expected to bring heavy downpours Saturday
text:
By News 12 Staff ,
1 hour ago
Headlines:
An all day rain is on the way. Flooding is a concern with downpours in the afternoon. NOW: Storm Team Meteorologist Michele Powers says it's quiet and dry, but a coastal storm is on the way.
FORECAST: The costal storm will merge with a front to our west, increasing the chance of heavy rain up and down the I-95 corridor. The rain will start early tomorrow morning between 2 a.m. and 3 a.m. At the onset, there will be some sleet and freezing rain for northern Litchfield County.
A winter weather advisory is in effect for parts of Connecticut. Higher elevations could have slick conditions and sheltered colder valleys.
Mixed precipitation is expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 1 inch and ice accumulations of around 1/10 of an inch.
Steady rain will fall by mid to late morning and through the day. Heavier downpours are likely between 4 p.m.- 7 p.m. This is when street flooding is more likely.
The rain will wrap up during the evening and by 9 p.m. Runoff will continue into the rivers, streams and creeks. Minor flooding on the Housatonic River by Sunday. Coastal flooding is low at this time. Better chance of that happening early next week with the full moon.
Winds will be gusty and closer to the shoreline we'll see 30-35 mph gusts. Windy into and through Sunday.
FLOOD WATCH:
There is a flood watch for the entire area from 7 a.m. Saturday until 2 a.m. Sunday.
2-3.5" of rain will fall and create some street/urban flooding. Eventually minor flooding on some rivers.
SATURDAY: Rain and wind with the storm offshore. Warmer. High of 52 (STORM WATCH)
SUNDAY: Gradual clearing and breezy. High of 47.
MONDAY: Mostly sunny. High of 50.
TUESDAY: Partly sunny. High of 50.
WEDNESDAY: Mostly cloudy with showers. High of 52.
THURSDAY: Mostly cloudy with showers. High of 55.
FRIDAY: Partly sunny. High of 59.
Expand All Read in NewsBreak

author: Thrift, W. J., Broadwell, Q., Perera, J., Lounsbury, N. W., Chen, J., Jhunjhunwala, S.
title: Pep2Vec: An Interpretable Model for Peptide-MHC Presentation Prediction and Contaminant Identification in Ligandome Datasets
text:
Abstract
As personalized cancer vaccines advance, precise modeling of antigen presentation by MHC class I and II is crucial. High-quality training data is essential for clinical models. Existing deep learning models focus on prediction performance but lack interpretability. We introduce Pep2Vec, a modular, transformer-based model trained on MHC I and II ligandome data, transforming input sequences into interpretable vectors. This approach integrates source protein features and elucidates the source of its performance gains, revealing regions that correlate with gene expression and protein-protein interactions. Pep2Vec's peptide latent space shows relationships between peptides of varying MHC class, allotype, lengths, and submotifs. This enables identifying four major contaminant types, constituting 5.0% of our data. Pep2Vec enhances MHC presentation prediction, achieving higher average precision on our presentation test set and immunogenicity datasets than existing models, and reducing contaminant-like peptide recommendations. Pep2Vec addresses a critical need for the development of more precise and effective applications of peptide MHC models, such as for cancer vaccines and antibody deimmunization.
Competing Interest Statement
All authors are employees of Genentech
CC-BY-NC-ND 4.0 International license.

author: Roger García
title: Mario Aburto interpone recurso de queja contra decisión judicial que desechó amparo por tortura
text:
Nacional Foto de Mexicanos contra la Corrupción Mario Aburto interpone recurso de queja contra decisión judicial que desechó amparo por tortura
La defensa de Mario Aburto interpuso un recurso de queja ante el Sexto Tribunal Colegiado en Materia Penal en la Ciudad de México
abril 25, 2024 Mario Aburto Martínez , asesino del candidato priista a la Presidencia Luis Donaldo Colosio , interpuso un recurso de queja que busca impugnar una decisión judicial donde se desechó un amparo por una supuesta tortura que sufrió al momento de su detención, el 23 de marzo de 1994.
El periódico Milenio apuntó que dicho recurso fue interpuesto en el Sexto Tribunal Colegiado en Materia Penal en la Ciudad de México, donde los magistrados solicitaron información a la autoridad oficiante.
Aburto Martínez busca echar la decisión de la jueza Segundo de Distrito de Amparo en Materia Penal en la Ciudad de México, Paloma Xiomara González , quien decidió hace unos días determinó desechar la demanda de garantías.
En febrero del presente año, la Fiscalía General de la República ( FGR ) autorizó en definitiva el no ejercicio de la acción penal en la investigación que inició por el presunto delito de tortura en agravio de Aburto Martínez.
Lo anterior fue informado por el Ministerio Público Federal a Paloma Xiomara, jueza que dio varios días a Mario Aburto y a su defensa para impugnar.
El priista Luis Donaldo Colosio Murrieta recibió dos balazos el 23 de marzo de 1994 mientras saludaba a la multitud en un mitin en la colonia Lomas Taurinas, en Tijuana, Baja California.
Si bien en aquel momento se detuvo al presunto asesino material, Mario Aburto, quien actualmente cumple condena en la cárcel, las investigaciones se prolongaron durante años en busca de un posible autor intelectual o de un complot.
El asesinato de Colosio Murrieta se considera el magnicidio más grave en México desde 1928, cuando fue asesinado el presidente electo Álvaro Obregón, quien ya había presidido el país en el periodo 1920-1924
Con información de Milenio
